name: Super Stick Adventure !!
description:
HOOOOLY CRAP I ACTUALLY DID IT. Sorry that this was submitted a bit late, and that perhaps it's a bit (really) buggy ;;

Though for my first ever game completed practically alone I'm really happy! Especially since I don't usually play platformers, much less MAKE THEM LMAOOO

I'm going to credit the music here as well as of course in the 'Credits' section in the actual game!
MUSIC
"Funny Cat" - BuGuMi
"Funny Cat" - Sunha Lee
"Cats" - Music by Pedro

PROGRAMMING & ART: 
Me<3
Follow me on twitter as well at either @forbiddengardxn or @nekomaidann

Engine Used: Unity
Art Program Used: Clip Studio Paint

Thank you everyone who even takes a moment to look at this and of course I hope everyone had a wonderful holiday and has an even more wonderful upcoming year! <3
